source.16d0d348:
%%writefile README.md
# Goblin Abode

This package includes Random Goblin bot for Kaggle's RPS competition.
Use that wretch at your own risk and responsibility.
source.70d436a1:
%%writefile setup.py
import setuptools

with open("README.md", "r") as fh:
    long_description = fh.read()

setuptools.setup(
    name="goblin-abode", # name of this package
    version="0.0.3",
    author="write here name of the author of this package",
    author_email="author@example.com", # email of the author of this package
    description="whrite here short description of this package",
    long_description=long_description,
    long_description_content_type="text/markdown",
    url="https://github.com/pypa/sampleproject", # a link to this project's homepage
    packages=setuptools.find_packages(),
    classifiers=[
        "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
        "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
        "Operating System :: OS Independent",
    ],
    python_requires='>=3.6',
)
source.a0e9c61a:
!pip install --user --upgrade setuptools wheel

!python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel

print("\nDONE")
source.cdf715fc:
!pip install --user --upgrade twine

!python3 -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/* -u __token__ -p # replace this comment with your TestPyPi API token: pypi-...

print("\nDONE")
source.2c18269b:
from goblin_abode import goblins

help(goblins.random_goblin)

# result should be 0, 1 or 2
print("result:", goblins.random_goblin(None, None))
